entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 08:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -28.4°C

Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
